page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT. HOLT. WORCS.
page.content: Due to mechanisation little manpower is needed in the farming industry and one man can cope with one hundred acres with some casual labour help. The major employer is a sand and gravel quarrying firm where 30 people work. Nine people are engaged in the packaging of bows and arrows which are made in Astley. This industry thrives due to the increase in{TOXOPHILITES.} Some jobs are created by three shops, three public houses and a petrol filling/service station. Most residents commute to the surrounding cities and towns to work by means of a private car.
